items.summary: Fix the Diyanet listing URL used by the backend sermon fetch so it matches the provided URL exactly (https://dinhizmetleri.diyanet.gov.tr/kategoriler/yayinlarimiz/hutbeler/t%C3%BCrk%C3%A7e) and is not double-URL-encoded.

Add a new backend update method that fully retrieves and parses the latest hutbe and returns a structured result (title, date, content) to the frontend, so the frontend does not need to parse the listing page or fetch the detail page in the browser.
Add backend-side caching for the latest parsed hutbe so the Cuma Hutbesi screen loads quickly on repeat visits, while still allowing refresh to fetch the newest sermon.

Update the frontend Cuma Hutbesi data flow to call the new backend structured sermon method (instead of parsing the listing HTML in the browser and instead of fetching the sermon detail page with window.fetch), and keep all new Cuma Hutbesi-specific user-facing text in English (tab label remains exactly “Cuma Hutbesi”).

Tune React Query behavior for the sermon query to improve perceived speed: keep previous sermon content visible while a background refetch is happening, and avoid unnecessary refetch loops that cause long loading on mobile.
